"Jump index: an average salary will lose 400 € / year Thousands of euros on a career.What lack of respect for workers" # 1ermaiPS
"I think of workers who are involuntarily part-time, the federal government withdraws them 500 € / month !!!" # 1ermaiPS
"I would like to remind the federal government that the wealth of a country is produced by the workers, YES, they deserve more respect." # 1ermaiPS
"The PS has tabled a law for a wealth tax.According to Court of Auditors, it could bring in 2.3 billion!" # 1ermaiPS
"The right does not mean anything to the demands of the workers, but what about the diamond dealers, Michel Gvt finds a tailor-made solution" # 1ermaiPS

Current and former presidents, prime ministers, politicians, statesmen and public figures have considered issues related to world politics
Representatives of different nationalities, religions and ethnic minorities in Azerbaijan have always lived in peace and dignity.
Since independence, Azerbaijan has become one of the centers of multiculturalism in the world.
Parallel implementation of political and economic reforms in Azerbaijan, rapid transformation, stability (cont) http://t.co/UIm2I9W7hV
Today, Azerbaijan enjoys all liberties, our society is free, and all our freedoms are ensured.
Unfortunately, international law is no longer a concept that is respected by all states.
Territorial integrity is the fundamental principle of international law. There should be no contradiction here.
The territorial integrity of Azerbaijan is as valuable as the territorial integrity of other states.
If the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict had been resolved so far, we would not have witnessed other conflicts.
Azerbaijan's development was very successful and over the past decade, our economy has grown more than threefold.
This has been achieved not through energy resources, but through reform and recent work.
Economic independence allows us to pursue an independent foreign policy.
We want to live as we want. Our choice is democracy and social prosperity.
At present, we are implementing the Europe's largest infrastructure project, the Southern Gas Corridor.
It is part of our cooperation with the European Union, but our cooperation does not end there.
In the following years, there should be a more distinct approach to the member states of the Eastern Partnership by the European Union
The most appropriate format for us is a strategic partnership. It will reflect the essence and future of our relations.
